cast.title: What Time Is It There?
cast.overview: When a young street vendor with a grim home life meets a woman on her way to Paris, they forge an instant connection. He changes all the clocks in Taipei to French time.

cast.title: The Missing
cast.overview: A grandmother is looking for her grandson, a teenager for his grandfather.

cast.title: The Hole
cast.overview: In the final days of the year 1999, most everyone in Taiwan has died. A strange plague has ravished the island. Supposedly spread by cockroaches, the disease sends its victims into a psychosis where they act like the insects. Eventually, they die. The Hole takes place in a crumbling apartment building. Its two protagonists live right above and below each other. The woman is on the lower floor, and the pipes above her apartment are leaking fiercely, threatening to destroy her food supply, not to mention her sanity. She calls a plumber to go check it out, and he accidentally pokes a hole through the floor of the man's apartment. The two have never met before, and they come into contact through the hole.

cast.title: The River
cast.overview: In Taiwan a young man with a mysterious paralysis massages his neck with his mother's dildo, meanwhile the rain is flooding the island.

cast.title: Goodbye, Dragon Inn
cast.overview: On a dark, rainy night, an historic and regal Taipei cinema sees its final film: 1967 martial arts feature "Dragon Inn". As the film plays, the lives of the theater's various employees and patrons intersect, and two ghostly actors arrive to mourn the passing of an era.

cast.title: Rebels of the Neon God
cast.overview: Defying his parents, disaffected youth Hsiao Kang drops out of the local cram school to head for the bright lights of downtown Taipei. He falls in with Ah Tze, a young hoodlum, and their relationship is a confused mixture of hero-worship and rivalry that soon leads to trouble.

cast.title: Furious Slaughter
cast.overview: When a martial arts expert discovers the existence of an illegal slave trade in the 1930s, he goes to great lengths to overthrow it.

cast.title: The Swordsman of all Swordsmen
cast.overview: A master swordsman is on a twenty year quest to revenge the death of his parents.

cast.title: The Bone Crushing Kid
cast.overview: A tale of a lowly slave in feudal China who wants nothing more than to become a Kung Fu Expert.

cast.title: The Bold Three
cast.overview: Leopard killed his wife due to her unfaithfulness and ran away with his daughter, Sung Sung. He joined a horde of bandits lead by Tiger, who is impressed by Leopards ruthless ways and together they make good business. One day, Sung Sung, now a grown beautiful woman meets Dragon and because of his stubborn upright character she falls in love with him, but unbeknownst to her enemies are her father and uncle....

cast.title: Desperate Crisis
cast.overview: Thrilling basher from Taiwan set amidst the dangerous and contemporary world of gangsters & counterfeiters. A young Special agent investigates the core of the racket.

cast.title: Gecko Kung Fu
cast.overview: Set during China in the 1930's a young Chinese martial artist and Japanese resistance fighter strikes up a friendship with the daughter of a Japanese General leading to lots of intrigue and conflict

cast.title: Immortal Warriors
cast.overview: Immortal Warriors is a Taiwanese Martial Arts movie.
